pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - MobileMart - Best mobile accessories and gadgets store About us Reviews Our prices Contacts +91-845-1950168 mobilemart@gmail.com Privacy Policy At MobileMart, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers. We understand the importance of safeguarding your personal information, and we strive to ensure that your data is handled with the utmost care and respect. Information Collection and Use We collect certain personal information from you when you interact with our services, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide. This information is used to fulfill your requests, improve our services, and communicate with you about our products and offerings. We may also collect non-personal information, such as the type of device you are using, your browser type, and your IP address. This information is used to analyze trends, administer the site, and gather demographic information to improve our services. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our business, such as payment processors or shipping carriers. These third parties are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information and are prohibited from using it for any other purpose. In certain circumstances, we may be required to disclose your information in response to a legal request, such as a subpoena or court order, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of MobileMart, our customers, or the public. We will always strive to protect your privacy to the fullest extent possible. Data Security We take the security of your personal information very seriously. We employ a variety of physical, electronic, and administrative safeguards to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. These measures include secure servers, encryption, and strict access controls. Despite our best efforts, no method of data transmission or storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete the personal information we have on file for you. You may also opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. To exercise these rights or for any other privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at mobilemart@gmail.com. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or to comply with applicable laws and regulations. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or by sending you an email. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us at mobilemart@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing your inquiries and resolving any issues to the best of our ability. Thank you for choosing MobileMart. We appreciate your trust and look forward to serving you.
